semanticMarkup.ling.parse

Interface IParseTree

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<IParseTree>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractParseTree, StanfordParseTree

    public interface IParseTree
extends java.lang.Iterable<IParseTree>
    An IParseTree poses a parse tree generated by a syntactic parser (e.g. stanford parser) A IParseTree consists of nodes which themselves constitute IParseTrees.
